title: whens next URF?
body: Whens next urf i have been waiting for ever .... #{{champion:86}}

replies.body: next year. I doubt that they would give the players what they want and release urf again until next year. If they release urf however, it would be time to play {{champion:17}}

Riot stated it would be in the RGM "atleast twice this year". Both times already have been and gone. Despite it being the most requested game mode, i doubt there is any interest for them to bring it out again this year.
And if so, even once more would be a miracle {{champion:32}}
